page.title: 06SANDWICK - HOLM ROAD
page.content: {Holm Road}is a road with 14 houses, they are all private houses and have all been built since the{second world {war. Holm Road has also a{small shop.}It is a food shop and acts as the main shop for people in the area. Along Holm Road there are a few loom sheds where they make tweed to sell. none of the houses on Holm Road have {crofts,}they are all built on feus. Most of the houses are quite modern and are of mediumn size. A lot of old people occupy these houses. It is a quiet road with a nice view.
